column1: ConditionsAll existing traffic and parking controls and restrictionsshall apply without a Special Traffic Permit issued bySFMTA. Please check Blue Book for traffic restrictions.To obtain a Blue Book, contact SFMTA at 415-701-4673.A minimum of 4 feet of clearance should be availableat all times to allow for public path of travel.Pursuant to Article 29 of the San Francisco PoliceCode, a Night Noise Permit for operation in the PublicRight-of-Way shall be required for work that createsany noise 5dBA above the ambient noise level of thatarea at the nearest property plane.No noise permitted between the hours of 7:00PM and7:00AM.Event/Operation:Fiber SplicingPermit Linear Footage40Elements of OccupancyTruck and trailer for splicing fiberFrom:7/18/2017 8:00AMStart Time8:00AMTo:7/20/2017 5:00PMEnd Time5:00PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.
